articles.title: Jobs in times of coronavirus
articles.description: For now, most employers are holding off, with many seeking govt intervention.

If the crisis continues, many sectors could see huge job losses. 
For now, most employers are holding off, with many seeking govt intervention. 
ET reporters spoke to industry experts for a sector-by-sector lowdown.
